<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 23"
    pfs=""
>
[Shot of the First Vault](/Equipment.aspx?ID=619)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 112</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Legends claim that some long-forgotten god stole the original bundle of _shots of the First Vault_ from [Abadar’s](/Deities.aspx?ID=1) repository. Since then, individual pieces have turned up throughout the multiverse. When you pick up a _shot of the First Vault_, it immediately reshapes itself to function with any ranged weapon and establishes you as its owner until another creature picks it up. As its owner, you can use the shot’s single-action activation after shooting it.

 Instead of rolling weapon damage dice, a _shot of the First Vault_ deals 25 damage plus any bonuses or additional damage as if 25 were the result of the weapon’s damage dice; the damage type matches that normally dealt by the weapon. Upon damaging a creature, the _shot of the First Vault_ shatters, and the fragments ricochet to hit any other enemies within 30 feet, making attack rolls with the same attack bonus. The shattered fragments remain lodged in the creatures they damage; the creatures are [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) while the fragments remain in place. A total of 3 actions, which have the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait, are required to remove the fragments from yourself or an adjacent creature; alternatively, a single action and a successful DC 30 [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) check can be used. A critical failure on this Medicine check deals 10 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to the creature with the embedded fragment.

<document level="2" id="action-406" />

<document level="2" id="action-407" />

**Destruction** If 10 _shots of the First Vault_ are all fired at the same group of [keketar](/Monsters.aspx?ID=338) or izfiitar [proteans](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=82) within 1 minute of each other, each shot was a hit, and the shots are then recalled, the shots collide as they attempt to re-form and crumble to dust.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
